title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2529.8 - Final determination by the commissioner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2529.8 - Final determination by the commissioner

State Regulations

The commissioner, on such terms and conditions as he
determines, shall: (a) dismiss the PAR
if it fails substantially to comply with the provisions of the RSL or this

Code; or
(b) grant or deny the PAR, in whole or in part, or remand the proceeding to the rent administrator for
further action; The commissioner shall inform all parties to the PAR of
the grounds upon which such decision is based. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2529.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
